summary: An abstract base class that centralizes common functionality for HuBERT models, handling weight initialization, providing utilities to compute convolution output dimensions, determine feature extraction output lengths, generate attention masks for feature vectors, and offering a simple interface for downloading and loading pretrained weights.
business_intent: Streamline the deployment of pretrained HuBERT speech models by reducing setup complexity, ensuring proper parameter initialization, and supplying essential preprocessing helpers for downstream speech processing applications.
